bill.summary:
Social Security Enhancement and Protection Act of 2017
This bill increases and otherwise modifies benefits under the Old Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance program, including by increasing the minimum benefit for low earners and by increasing benefits for beneficiaries on account of long-term eligibility.
